descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Scare your friends and family in terrifying VR with AFFECTED: The Manor!

Whether you love testing your nerves or watching others lose theirs, AFFECTED: The Manor delivers unforgettable VR scares. With simple controls and zero puzzles, this is pure horror immersion: no keys, no objectives,  just a relentless haunted walkthrough designed to make anyone scream, from VR newcomers to seasoned gamers.

The Complete Edition includes the original nightmare experience plus two additional modes:

THE GAUNTLET

A high-intensity horror speedrun! Race through The Manor as fast as you can while trying not to scream. Compare your performance on global leaderboards.

THE DARKNESS

A whole new way to experience The Manor. Navigate pitch-black rooms with only a flickering candle to guide you. Every shadow hides something, or someone.

The Complete Edition also includes new Achievements, accessibility and inclusivity options, and support for 10 languages.
